name: CNC Machine Tool Path
summary: Learn about .CNC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: CNC milling machines are used to remove material from an object using rotary cutters. These machines are controlled by computers to execute pre-programmed machine control commands. The CNC file is created by QuickCAM Pro to contain a path that is loaded into a CNC milling machine to direct its milling.
NOTE: CNC stands for computer numerical control.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
